author: Simon Difford
description: A splash of lime adds zesty citrus balance to this delicate rose-pink tinted rum and vermouth cocktail with a touch of pomegranate contributing fruity sweetness.
name: El Presidente (Sloppy Joe's)
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
